name: The world in the Nutshell
description:
It is a game about universes that suggests that each is determined by a tiny derivation of the universe, that there are various universes, and that the history and expansion of the universe may be caused by two other bubbles. Expansion, without an expanding centre.

Gameplay: The player can control the direction of the green ball by using the arrow keys to move it.

The black coloured blocks are black holes and the game ends when they are black.

Yellow squares: can be swallowed.

Red body talent: are other balloons. Please note that you only swallow it if it is bigger than everyone else! Otherwise you will explode.
